219
+1

binery counting 0,1  // bit -> byte -> kilobyte -> megabyte ->Gigabyte -> terrabyte -> pettabyte


2^2 = 4
00 // 2 bit -> 0,1,2,3
01 
10
11



2^3 = 8
000 // 3 bit - > 0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7
001
010
011
100
101
110
111

// 2^4 = 16
0000
0001
0010


// byte -> 8 bit
2^8 = 256
0000 0000

// 1kbye -> 1000*byte = 8000 bit
2^8000 =

mega -> 1000*1kyle = 1000*8000 bit 

2^8000000

"sup tom"

octali -> 01234567

hexadecimal -> 0123456789ABCDEF1011
